# ThingsBoard 
[![Join the chat at https://gitter.im/thingsboard/chat](https://badges.gitter.im/Join%20Chat.svg)](https://gitter.im/thingsboard/chat?utm_source=badge&utm_medium=badge&utm_campaign=pr-badge&utm_content=badge)
[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/thingsboard/thingsboard.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/thingsboard/thingsboard)
[![ThingsBoard Builds Server Status](https://img.shields.io/teamcity/build/e/ThingsBoard_Build?label=TB%20builds%20server&server=https%3A%2F%2Fbuilds.thingsboard.io&logo=data:image/png;base64,&labelColor=305680)](https://builds.thingsboard.io/viewType.html?buildTypeId=ThingsBoard_Build&guest=1)

ThingsBoard is an open-source IoT platform for data collection, processing, visualization, and device management.

 

## Documentation

ThingsBoard documentation is hosted on [thingsboard.io](http://u.720life.cn/g/e9ef43ba5ca95f567a3a96171ad805a13c716f85b2385b542450a20cfa5f0740 

## IoT use cases

[**Smart metering**](http://u.720life.cn/g/e9ef43ba5ca95f567a3a96171ad805a1d82b1a5eadeeabfef219bdec15ad6e49fe4fc215d97e662d661e16effe820d59) 
[![Smart metering](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8308069/31455788-6888a948-aec1-11e7-9819-410e0ba785e0.gif "Smart metering")](https://thingsboard.io/smart-metering/)

[**IoT Rule Engine**](http://u.720life.cn/g/e9ef43ba5ca95f567a3a96171ad805a1e57f0d262d537136ba4455bf8402bedc3bd19860fb1133e4d19d66d0dc4f3d30c1c190459275522c6ef2fdb59d9b37605e9b3f1905012beb8a0d51e12dc97e9d) 
[![IoT Rule Engine](https://thingsboard.io/images/demo/send-email-rule-chain.gif "IoT Rule Engine")](https://thingsboard.io/docs/user-guide/rule-engine-2-0/re-getting-started/)

[**Smart energy**](http://u.720life.cn/g/e9ef43ba5ca95f567a3a96171ad805a104459b0f327aa555f71142c55477ee3d3cb3bd8507021aed54059090099692f8) 
[![Smart energy](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/8308069/24495682/aebd45d0-153e-11e7-8de4-7360ed5b41ae.gif "Smart energy")](https://thingsboard.io/smart-energy/)

[**Smart farming**](http://u.720life.cn/g/e9ef43ba5ca95f567a3a96171ad805a1e15b8a5a7ae6bfef536ccac699d4a162c183ed94be74523d651437d7ee4b5c51) 
[![Smart farming](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/8308069/24496824/10dc1144-1542-11e7-8aa1-5d3a281d5a1a.gif "Smart farming")](https://thingsboard.io/smart-farming/)

[**Fleet tracking**](http://u.720life.cn/g/e9ef43ba5ca95f567a3a96171ad805a1180f0dc296a31ef09c7b825a2e9044fe3170e2e2d8d03db66d62339accdd9865) 
[![Fleet tracking](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/8308069/24497169/3a1a61e0-1543-11e7-8d55-3c8a13f35634.gif "Fleet tracking")](https://thingsboard.io/fleet-tracking/)

## Getting Started

Collect and Visualize your IoT data in minutes by following this [guide](http://u.720life.cn/g/e9ef43ba5ca95f567a3a96171ad805a1b103546104e2af7c4ef49492a3f3331140076552c74f502d8ac32494a8bff2e57e3fa4dbf2f493c1e2361157d64a42b1
